name: ta459

procedures: T1059.001::[TA459] has used PowerShell for execution of a payload.
T1059.005::[TA459] has a VBScript for execution.
T1203::[TA459] has exploited Microsoft Word vulnerability CVE-2017-0199 for execution.
T1204.002::[TA459] has attempted to get victims to open malicious Microsoft Word attachment sent via spearphishing.
T1566.001::[TA459] has targeted victims using spearphishing emails with malicious Microsoft Word attachments.

description: [TA459](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0062) is a threat group believed to operate out of China that has targeted countries including Russia, Belarus, Mongolia, and others. (Citation: Proofpoint TA459 April 2017)
